meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Linda Vestrand Hunter Sandison Ben Ingram Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6643.

td.p: Linda Vestrand, a human resources professional from Youngstown, Ohio
Hunter Sandison, a camera operator from Los Angeles, California
Ben Ingram, an IT consultant originally from Florence, South Carolina (whose 2-day cash winnings total $42,030)

tr.td: TENNIS THE MENACE
TV LOGOS
THE ORIGINAL 31 FLAVORS
4-LETTER "V"ORDS
A CONNECTICUT YANKEE
IN KING ARTHUR'S COURT
